acme.name: SERP Analysis
insights: Ranked in top 3 for 'cartoon physics' in AI summaries.
Not appearing for 'rocket powered skates' queries.

issues.title: Low visibility in Perplexity
issues.description: Your brand is not cited in Perplexity answers for 5 of your 10 target keywords.

recommendations: Create a detailed guide on 'The Physics of Roadrunners'.
Improve semantic linking between product pages and informational content.

acme.name: Content Quality
insights: 'Anvil Usage Guide' is considered highly original content.
Product descriptions are too short for AI to generate rich snippets.

issues.title: Thin content on 15 product pages
issues.description: Product pages have less than 150 words, which is insufficient for AI models.

recommendations: Expand product descriptions to include use cases, specifications, and customer stories.

stark.name: SERP Analysis
insights: Dominating AI search for 'powered armor' and 'arc reactor technology'.
recommendations: Maintain current content velocity and internal linking strategy.

stark.name: Content Quality
insights: Whitepapers on clean energy are frequently cited by AI models.
recommendations: Explore creating video content to complement existing whitepapers.

wayne.name: SERP Analysis
insights: High visibility for 'grappling hook' and 'utility belt' queries.

issues.title: Brand narrative disconnect
issues.description: AI models associate 'Wayne' primarily with technology, not philanthropy, despite significant investment.

recommendations: Create a dedicated microsite for the Wayne Foundation's activities, with clear schema markup.

wayne.name: Content Quality
insights: Content is well-structured but lacks personal author bios.

issues.title: Lack of author attribution
issues.description: Blog posts and articles lack clear author information, impacting E-E-A-T signals.

recommendations: Implement author schema and create detailed author bio pages for all content creators.
